FuncDef: This command configures the BVPLS flush. If B-SDPs are used and MAC notification mechanism is turned on in the related BVPLS (MPLS use case), it makes sense to turn off the T-LDP MAC Flush.

ParaDef.Info: Flushes on a negative event, such as pseudowire failure.
Flushes on a positive event, such as pseudowire activation.
